title: Better understanding of soft artificial muscles
description: Researchers have uncovered the fundamental science behind artificial muscles that will allow them to empower soft robot and create wearable devices.

title: Pistons are muscling up
description: New generation of pistons made of soft materials can work under lower pressure with more efficiency.

title: Creating versatile artificial muscles for life-like robots
description: Scientist find out how to make artificial muscles that looks even more like real muscles.

title: A New Twist on Artificial Muscles
description: Sctientifics discover how to mimics muscles by heating and cooling tiny fibers. They also find out that others chemicals could also do that

title: Artificial “muscles” achieve powerful pulling force
description: Artificial fiber that contratcs could mimic real muscles. Those reaserch could be a very good thing for biomedical devices and robotics
